Top Ten, the.translation[0].definitions[: the ten best-selling recordings of popular music in a particular week
Tune in to Radio 1 for this week's Top Ten.
a record that reached the Top Ten in December 1995
any list of the ten best-selling products or most successful organizations of a particular type. There are sometimes also longer lists, such as the Top Twenty or Top Fifty
Compaq is one of the world's Top Ten computer companies.
